title: Two fonts ID -- flourish and serif
content:
A designer created this for me and I love it, but he’s disappeared and so have his fonts. Can anyone identify these for me please?  
With both of them — I see things like it, but not exactly. Any ideas?

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [LGO GYBCOL004 MAY008.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907163739/http:/typophile.com/files/LGO%20GYBCOL004%20MAY008.jpg) | 21.09 KB |

 [‹ Please ID this typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907163739/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45228 "Go to previous forum topic") [Discovery Channel new logo sans serif font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907163739/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44324 "Go to next forum topic")
author: doollady

comments.content: The left is one of the light weights of Helvetica Neue, but I don’t know the script off the top of my head.

Thank you so much. you are total legends!  
Gayle
